title: Best 8 Coins For The Next Crypto Bull Run - Analytics Insight
content: InQubeta (BETA), represented by the token symbol QUBE, is a groundbreaking project built on the Ethereum network designed to be the world's first Web3 crowdfunding platform. It stands as a unique platform for crowdfunding artificial intelligence (AI) start-ups, an area that has immense potential for growth and innovation. The platform's core proposition is to democratize investments in AI startups by fractionalizing them, essentially offering the chance to "get in on the ground floor" of the next big AI solution, irrespective of the size of one's investment portfolio. Each investment opportunity is minted into a non-fungible token (NFT) and fractionalized, allowing investors to contribute according to their budget. InQubeta's upcoming NFT marketplace will provide a platform for these AI startups to raise funds and offer reward and equity-based NFTs to QUBE token holders.

title: Vitalik on SEC Going After Tokens of Honorable Projects Such As Solana - CryptoGlobe
content:
In a recent exchange with Matt Huang, Co-Founder and Managing Partner of Paradigm, a crypto-focused venture capital firm, Ethereum’s creator Vitalik Buterin expressed his concerns over the U.S. policy approach to cryptocurrency. His comments came in the wake of the U.S. Security and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) lawsuits against Binance and Coinbase, two of the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchanges.

The SEC’s allegations against Binance and Coinbase include offering unregistered securities to the public. The lawsuits have also cast a shadow over several other tokens, including Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Coti (COTI), Algorand (ALGO), Filecoin (FIL), Cosmos (ATOM), Sandbox (SAND), Axie infinity (AXS), Decentraland (MANA), BNB (BNB), Voyager Token (VGX), Chiliz (CHZ), NEAR protocol (NEAR), Flow (FLOW), Dash (DASH), NEXO (NEXO), and Internet Computer (ICP).

These allegations have left the status of these tokens in a state of uncertainty, creating risks for markets and participants transacting in these tokens, as well as potentially for their creators. This was highlighted by Jesse Overall and Steve Gatti, attorneys at the UK-based law firm Clifford Chance, in a recent conversation with CoinDesk.

In this context, Buterin’s comments reflect a sense of solidarity with other blockchain projects, particularly Solana. He expressed regret that Solana and other projects are being targeted in this manner, stating, “They don’t deserve it, and if Ethereum ends up ‘winning’ through all other blockchains getting kicked off exchanges, that’s not an honorable way to win, and in the long term probably isn’t even a victory.”

Buterin’s comments underscore the fact that the real competition for blockchain projects is not each other but the rapidly expanding centralized world that is imposing itself on the decentralized space. He concluded his remarks by wishing all “honorable projects” a fair outcome in the ongoing situation.

title: Cryptocurrency Price Today: Bitcoin, Ethereum See Gains As Flow Becomes Top Gainer - ABP Live
content:
Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) — two of the most valued crypto coins — managed to rise above the $30,000 and $19,000 marks, respectively, on early Sunday morning. Other popular altcoins — including the likes of Ripple (XRP) and Litecoin (LTC)— landed in the positive as overall prices saw minor gains across the board. Flow (FLOW) emerged to be the biggest gainer, seeing a 24-hour jump of over 20.72 percent. eCash (XEC), on the other hand, turned out to be the biggest loser.



At the time of writing, the global crypto market cap stood at $1.19 trillion, registering a 24-hour gain of 0.56 percent.

Bitcoin (BTC) price today

Bitcoin price stood at $30,528.31 seeing a 24-hour gain of 0.62 percent, as per CoinMarketCap. According to Indian exchange WazirX, BTC price stood at Rs 26 lakhs.

Ethereum (ETH) price today

ETH price stood at $1,915.54, marking a 24-hour gain of 0.24 percent at the time of writing. As per WazirX, Ethereum price in India stood at Rs 1.63 lakhs.

Dogecoin (DOGE) price today

DOGE registered a 24-hour loss of 3.06 percent as per CoinMarketCap data, currently priced at $0.06716. As per WazirX, Dogecoin price in India stood at Rs 5.7111.

Litecoin (LTC) price today

Litecoin saw a 24-hour gain of 1.88 percent. At the time of writing, it was trading at $107.25. LTC price in India stood at Rs 9,150.00.

Ripple (XRP) price today

XRP price stood at $0.4884, seeing a 24-hour gain of 4.56 percent. As per WazirX, Ripple price stood at Rs 42.0001.

Solana (SOL) price today

Solana price stood at $19.07, marking a 24-hour gain of 5.61 percent. As per WazirX, SOL price in India stood at Rs 1,669.96.

Top crypto gainers today (July 2)

As per CoinMarketCap data, here are the top five crypto gainers over the past 24 hours:

Flow (FLOW)

Price: $0.6474

24-hour gain: 20.72 percent

NEAR Protocol (NEAR)

Price: $1.45

24-hour gain: 6.81 percent

BitDAO (BIT)

Price: $0.4217

24-hour gain: 6.32 percent

The Sandbox (SAND)

Price: $0.4414

24-hour gain: 5.78 percent

Uniswap (UNI)

Price: $5.49

24-hour gain: 5.56 percent

Top crypto losers today (July 2)

As per CoinMarketCap data, here are the top five crypto losers over the past 24 hours:

eCash (XEC)

Price: $0.00003449

24-hour loss: 17.47 percent

Bitcoin SV (BSV)

Price: $47.67

24-hour loss: 8.99 percent

Ethereum Classic (ETC)

Price: $20.02

24-hour loss: 4.44 percent

Rocket Pool (RPL)

Price: $36.49

24-hour loss: 4.35 percent

Bitcoin Cash (BCH)

Price: $272.81

24-hour loss: 4.11 percent

title: DeGod NFTs Might Follow Bullish Market Sentiments - The Market Periodical
content:
The floor price of DeGods NFT is $18,191.14, with a volume of 480.85 ETH in 24 hours.

DeGods shifted from Solana to Ethereum in December, 2022.

DeGods posted its journey so far after launching the first bounty white list challenge.

DeGods is PFP (Profile Picture) NFT, a digital art display and international community of designers, creators, entrepreneurs, athletes, artists, and innovators.

The charts below show the position of DeGods in the NFT marketplace. Having a floor price of 9.03 ETH with a total volume of 34.22K ETH, the market cap of DeGods is 84.87K ETH with 1984 holders.

Source: NFTgo.io

From the month of April 2023, the whales of DeGods NFTs have doubled from 6 to 12. One of the top DeGods whales contains 2.66% of the total NFTs while sitting at an unrealized profit of 1.7K ETH

Source: NFTgo.io

The sales recorded for the NFT for a floor price of 9.03 ETH, the calculated average price was 8.81 ETH with a drop of 2.71%. Its normal sales counted to 8 and 19 whales were found involved.

According to the Open Sea stats, 67% of owners have only 1 time in their collection whereas the highest number of collected items goes with 0.5% of DeGods owners. The total number of owners as per the source is 1985.

Source: OpenSea

DeGods #741 has been recorded in the latest listing whereas the DeGod #8317 has been recently sold at 8.860 WETH, 6% less than its floor price.

DeGods Skipped Solana and Moved to Ethereum in the 2022-Last Quarter

According to a tweet by Frank lll, the DeGods and its relative collection y00ts NFTs of parent company Dust Labs moved to Ethereum and a blockchain more, parallelly.

The top NFT project on Solana, DeGods, in Dec 2022, announced about officially bridging the project to Ethereum in Q1 of 2023. ‘Dust Labs’ backing the DeGods project planned to uncover the Season III roadmap in January through this migration.

DeGods on Ethereum had a floor price of 10.4 ETH (US$19,000). DeLabs, the Los Angeles-based NFT firm controlling DeGods and y00ts, disclosed that the project would move to newly designated blockchains by December 2021. It was similar to the time when Solana’s native coin, SOL, went beyond US$10 for the first time since the start of the year 2021.

Source: LunarCrush

The top five DeGods NFT influencers include Frank lll with a weighted average of 17 with one engagement and 6 followers with a total of 43 posts. Whale.swoosh stood at second rank with a weighted average of 18, 40 followers, and 11 posts with 2 engagements. Third stands Pattylce X+ followed by SheetFu and at the last is NFTstatistics.eth in the top five.

Market Sentiments Relating to DeGods

Source: LunarCrush

According to the market sentiments the chances of a bullish trend is more as compared to the bearish trend which are 28.1% and 11.4% respectively. The total social engagements are 45.3 Million but dropped from the initial engagements by 26.03%. The bullish sentiments are 1.91K whereas the bearish sentiments in the market are just 453.
